message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video captioning, which is a task related to natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) are the most likely sub-categories. The use of reinforcement learning and policy gradient methods also suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper also discusses the use of metrics and evaluation, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
